User's Manual
=============

The User\'s Manual for the ``ntpSystem`` package describes how 
to use the different containers and function to easily add, edit, and retrieve data. 

Add/Edit Data
-------------

Multiple containers exist to enable easy addition and edit of data

	1. :ref:`Material container <newmaterialcard>`: to define and add new materials.
	2. :ref:`Steady state input container <ssinpscards>`: to define all the inputs needed for a steday state simulation.
	3. ...
